item.title: Blocked drain Gillingham Row, 9th August
item.description:
Drain at beginning of Gillingham Row (Vauxhill Bridge Road end) has been blocked by plastic bags and other refuse. will overflow with rain
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Gillingham Row, Victoria, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedge occupies most of the footpath outside B&Q by Crittals Corner roundabout DA14 6LX., 9th August
item.description:
The available footpath is barely 2 feet wide, not enough for a pedestrian and a 30 mph electric scooter rider to pass each other safely. It’s been like this for a couple of years. It was trimmed recently but all they do is take off the new growth but do nothing about cutting it back the 2 feet or more required to reclaim the footpath.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Watery Lane, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large bolts on highway, 9th August
item.description:
Possibly after a collision - 2 large bolts left on highway that are likely to cause a problem for cyclists (I've had a few near misses) - puncture, wheel rim dents or maybe even rider falling off.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kentish Way, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car crashed blocking footway, 9th August
item.description:
I think the image speaks volumes. It’s been there more than 72 hours. It completely blocks the pavement forcing foot traffic into main road. This is a danger to pedestrians and needs action.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61-63, Croydon Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree, 9th August
item.description:
Further to my report 7676402 06:43, Sunday 8 June 2025 @ 06:43 and your responce 21/07/2025 15:05 Email from Bexley Council NO FURTHER ACTION. The sign as of 08/08/2025 is now COMPLTELY BLOCK by the tree . I have Dash Cam Footage but coul not upload it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 74, Crayford Road, Crayford, Dartford

item.title: Badley guarded, barriers knocked over by cars, trip hazard with entry to property, 9th August
item.description:
This has been dug up over 2 weeks ago and left like that, no one has been out to diagnose problems with tree or sort problem. Pedestrians struggling to cross road due to bad road works guarding I'm constantly going out aged 63 picking up barriers and putting them back together

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ash Grove, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins on pavement, 9th August
item.description:
Bins are still on the pavement 2 days after collection and causing issues with access for disabled pedestrians. These bins have been here for 2+ years

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birling Road, Northumberland Heath, London
